title: Tell my wife I won't be home for dinner
creator_credit: Jack Duncan, Paul Ferguson and Cygnet Guild Communications
brief_description: Three case studies demonstrate a variety of examples of common mismanagement of time and their consequences. This film offers guidance on how to recognise ineffective time management and to establish effective time use rules.
